Mobiles › Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 › Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Benchmark

Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Geekbench and PCMark Score

  • Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Geekbench single-core score is 635 and multi-core benchmark score is 1,991
  • Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 PCMark battery performance time is 16h 21m
Benchmark Type Benchmark Name Score
Overall Performance AnTuTu NA
Processor Performance Geekbench Single-core Geekbench Multi-core 635 1,991
Graphic Performance GFX Manhattan GFX Trex NA NA
Battery Performance PCMark 16h 21m

Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Benchmark Scores Overview

Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 1. The processor is Octa core (2 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A78 + 1.8 GHz, Hexa Core, Cortex A55) that uses 64 bit architecture and Adreno 619 GPU. It runs on Android v12 operating system with 4 GB RAM and 128 GB ROM.

Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Geekbench Score:

On Geekbench, Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 CPU is tested to check the performance of a single core as well as multiple cores in carrying out tasks. The Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 Geekbench multi-core score is 1,991 and single-core score is 635.

Geekbench Tested by 91mobiles

Geekbench Multi Core
The higher, the better
Group* Best 65,766
Group* Avg 2,722
This Phone 1,991
Worst 835
*Group: 14-20k Phones
Geekbench Single Core
The higher, the better
Group* Best 2,523
This Phone 635
Group* Avg 621
Worst 152
*Group: 14-20k Phones

Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 PCMark Score:

PCMark is used to benchmark the Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 battery performance on real-world tasks. The Xiaomi Redmi Note 12 PCMark battery performance time is 16h 21m .

PCMark Tested by 91mobiles

Battery Life (PCMark Benchmark)
The higher, the better
Group* Best 26.4
This Phone 16.4
Group* Avg 15.5
Worst 7.4
*Group: 14-20k Phones
